question: The "W-Arli-Pendjari Complex" (WAP Complex) is a transnational site located among which nations?
explanation: The "W-Arli-Pendjari Complex" is a transnational site located across Benin, Burkina Faso and Niger. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This site includes Sudano-Sahelian Savannah which includes grasslands, shrub lands, wooded savannah. It is home to the largest population of elephants in Western Africa and also includes mammals such as the African Manatee, Cheetah, Lion and Leopard. The W National Park is located in Niger.
